feature.label: KNIME Matlab Scripting extension
feature.provider-name: Max Planck Institute of Molecular Cell Biology and Genetics (MPI-CBG)
feature.description: The Matlab Scripting Integration provides a collection of KNIME nodes to develop and integrate matlab scripts and templates.
feature.copyright: KNIME Matlab Scripting extension Copyright (c) 2014, Max Planck Institute of Molecular Cell Biology and Genetics (MPI-CBG) All rights reserved.
